entry.title: Online workshop: One offer at a time

entry.title: Your body can create 1001 characters!
entry.content:
Change your voice, play with your face, transform your attitude, your body is a formidable metamorphosing tool!.

Through guided exercises based on Lecoq‚Äôs work, we will discover the power of every muscle and the thousand forms your body can take to personify characters you didn‚Äôt imagine playing. They are all...

entry.title: Mime and object work
entry.content:
This workshop focuses on a side-skill : miming and object and space work.

Having a clear vision of your environment, the objects and furnitures that are around, the size and weight of the mimes you use, is an helpful friend to make your stories more true to you, your partners...
